title: Blizzard Proudly Presents: Heroes of the Storm™!
description: This morning, Mike Morhaime, CEO and cofounder of Blizzard Entertainment, officially unveiled the name of our newest game: Heroes of the Storm™. Welcome to the official Heroes website.

title: Happy Thanksgiving!
description: It's that time of year when we take a moment to look around and reflect on good fortune and great fun. We've got a new piece of Thanksgiving-themed artwork by Luke "Mr. Jack" Mancini for you.

title: VOD Now Available: Q+A with the Heroes Dev Team
description: We're sure you've got a ton of questions about Heroes of the Storm -- and we've got answers. Join us for our first live Q&A with members of the Heroes development team tomorrow at Twitch.tv/BlizzHeroes.

title: Heroes Holiday Matches
description: We've got two brand new Heroes of the Storm matches to share with you today. The first features professional StarCraft II caster Mike 'Husky' Lamond alongside Game Director Dustin Browder, and the second is a game devoid of commentary that you can download to create your very own cast.

title: Calling All Fan Artists!
description: Do you have new and original Heroes fan art for us to highlight? Email us at FanArt@Blizzard.com. We’d love to help showcase your talents right here on the official Heroes of the Storm community site.

title: Heroes Developer Q+A: Round Two -- Twitch VOD Available
description: Join us at Twitch.tv/BlizzHeroes for our second live Heroes of the Storm Q&A panel on Wednesday, January 22 to get all your questions answered.

title: Create Your Own Heroes Commentary
description: Last Wednesday, Sean 'Day[9]' Plott and Dustin Browder teamed up to commentate a live Heroes of the Storm showmatch and we've got a second game to share with you today.

title: Blizzard is Hiring
description: We’re always on the lookout for awesome new talent: people who put gameplay first, are committed to quality, and want to learn and grow with us. We wouldn’t be Blizzard without the passion of our people -- and now we’re hiring more.

title: Community Commentary Round-Up
description: We recently released raw Heroes of the Storm gameplay footage that you could use to create your very own commentary. We scoured the internet to find shoutcasts made by the Heroes community and wrangled quite a few of them together to celebrate the hard work these players put into their creations.

title: Heroes Developer Q+A #3 -- VOD Now Available
description: Our third live Q&A session recently concluded and you can find VODs from the broadcast within.

title: So You Think You Can Cast
description: After our third live Heroes of the Storm Q&A session concluded, we recorded another showmatch that you can download and use to create your very own Heroes commentary. Check within to pick up the raw gameplay footage.

title: Reaper of Souls™—Pre-Order Loot Revealed
description:
Eager to secure your first future hero unlock in the Heroes of the Storm? We've got you covered.
Two epic new bonus items have just been revealed for the upcoming release of Diablo III: Reaper of Souls™, both of which will be granted in the future to anyone who pre-purchases the Reaper of Souls expansion digitally on Battle.net, or anyone who redeems a Reaper of Souls retail game key on or before March 31, 2014.

title: Blizzard and deviantART present: Reaper of Souls™ Fan Art Contest
description: Blizzard Entertainment has joined forces with deviantART to bring you a truly Legendary Diablo III: Reaper of Souls™ fan art contest! Over $11,000 worth of prizes and a two night trip to Blizzard HQ in Irvine, CA are up for grabs to the most talented artisans this side of Sanctuary!

title: The Art of Wu Xi, Athena
description: This Community Showcase spotlights an epic piece of Heroes of the Storm fan art by artist Wu Xi, Athena!

title: Casting Round-Up - March 3
description: We decided to release a raw, never-before-seen match to the community, once again played on Dragon Shire. As always, you the community responded in fashion by providing some very exciting commentary that we are ecstatic to share everyone.

title: Heroes of the Storm Technical Alpha FAQ
description: We just announced that the Heroes of the Storm Technical Alpha is on its way and we're sure you have quite a few questions. Check within to find out answers for common inquiries.

title: Introducing the Heroes of the Storm Technical Alpha
description: We’ve been hard at work on Heroes of the Storm since you last got your hands on the game at BlizzCon 2013 and we’re gearing up to invite a very limited number of players to join us in an initial phase of infrastructure and technology testing that we’re calling the Technical Alpha.

title: Diablo Heroes Preview
description: Take a step into Sanctuary and discover some of the upcoming Diablo Heroes that will be playable in Heroes of the Storm!

title: StarCraft Heroes Preview
description: Warp into Mar Sara and unearth some of the upcoming StarCraft Heroes that will be playable in Heroes of the Storm!

title: Warcraft Heroes Preview
description: Grab the nearest portal to Azeroth and discover some of the upcoming Warcraft Heroes that will be playable in Heroes of the Storm!

title: Heroes of the Storm Preview: Unlocking the Hero Within
description: Dig into the preview of our current plans for heroes, skins, mounts, and our experience and progression system in Heroes of the Storm!

title: Heroes of the Storm Video: Technical Alpha Walkthrough
description: Find out what awaits players who step into the Nexus with our new Tech Alpha Walkthrough video.

title: The Heroes of the Storm Technical Alpha is Now LIVE!
description: The Heroes of the Storm Technical Alpha is now live and the time has come for invitees to answer the call of the Nexus!

title: Blizzard at PAX East 2014!
description: Calling all Heroes, we've got something new to show you, and we're bringing it to PAX East!

title: Tychus Hero Spotlight
description: Tychus Findlay is a fearsome combatant whose impact on the battlefield is anything but subtle, and you can learn more about him in this Hero Spotlight blog!

title: VODs Available: Developer Q+A Broadcast -- Session 4
description: Our fourth live Q&A session with the Heroes of the Storm development team has concluded and, in case you missed the broadcast, we've got VODs from the event within.

title: So You Think You Can Cast: March edition
description: Grab your microphone and start stretching the vocal chords, because we’ll be collecting as many community-created casts as we can for another Commentary Round-Up blog next week.

title: The Art of Jian Guo, Breathing2004
description: This Community Showcase spotlights incredible pieces of Heroes of the Storm and Blizzard fan art by artist Jian Guo, Breathing2004!

title: New Costume Photo Galleries
description: Since our first BlizzCon costume contest was held back in 2004, we’ve met thousands of awesome cosplay enthusiasts who have dazzled us with their amazing Blizzard-themed costumes, and we would like to acknowledge their achievements with special galleries in our media sections—a permanent home for all Blizzard-themed costumes!

title: Death Awaits – Reaper of Souls™ is Now Live!
description: The crusade against Death itself has begun.

title: Celebrate Reaper of Souls with Two New Skins
description: We’re thrilled to join in the revelry surrounding the launch of Diablo III: Reaper of Souls™ with a pair of legendary new Hero skins, which you can preview within.

title: From The Bullpen: Team XP and Leveling
description: Game Director Dustin Browder shared a few thoughts from the Heroes design team to shed some light on team XP and leveling found in Heroes of the Storm.

title: Tyrael Hero Spotlight
description: Tyrael, the Archangel of Justice is a stalwart force to have on your side on any Battleground, and you can learn more about him in our newest Hero Spotlight blog!

title: April Fools! Pajamathur Hero Spotlight
description: Pajamathur, Baby Abathur, is a tactical powerhouse that knows just the right ways to get at your enemies’ heartstrings!

title: Community Caster Round Up: March Edition
description: We have released a never-before-seen match to the community, played on the Haunted Mines.

title: The #PAXPack2014 Giveaway is Now Live!
description: PAX Pack Giveaway BlogEnter to win 1 of 25  free Heroes of the Storm PAX Packs contains all of the exciting prizes we will be giving out this year at PAX East:

title: Heroes of the Storm PAX East Preview
description: We’re gearing up to storm PAX East 2014 in Boston, Massachusetts and we’ve got more Heroes content for you than Stitches himself could consume.

title: From the Bullpen: Hero Lethality
description: Game Director Dustin Browder has a few words to share on some of the development team's decisions behind overall hero survivability in Heroes of the Storm.

title: Heartbleed Account Security Notice
description: Many news sites are reporting a vulnerability (dubbed the Heartbleed bug) discovered in OpenSSL, an encryption technology used by a majority of websites and online services—including banks, email providers, and social media sites—to protect sensitive data as it’s transmitted from users to web services.

title: PAX East: Day 1 Recap
description: Day 1 of PAX East 2014 has just concluded, and we're excited to share some of the action directly from the show floor with you!

title: PAX East: Day 1 Recap
description: Day 1 of PAX East 2014 has just concluded, and we're excited to share some of the action directly from the show floor with you!

title: PAX East: Day 2
description: Day 1 of PAX East 2014 is behind us, and Day 2 has just wrapped up! In case you missed any of the action, or just want to know what's going on in Boston, we'll be updating this blog throughout the weekend with all manner of updates directly from the show floor!

title: PAX East: Day 2
description: Day 1 of PAX East 2014 is behind us, and Day 2 has just wrapped up! In case you missed any of the action, or just want to know what's going on in Boston, we'll be updating this blog throughout the weekend with all manner of updates directly from the show floor!

title: PAX East: Day 3
description: Day 3 of PAX East 2014 has just concluded, signaling with it the end of another fantastic Boston gaming extravaganza. Want to find out more about what went down today? Read on!

title: PAX East: Day 3
description: Day 3 of PAX East 2014 has just concluded, signaling with it the end of another fantastic Boston gaming extravaganza. Want to find out more about what went down today? Read on!

title: Brightwing Hero Week
description: Cute does not equal harmless, and Brightwing the Faerie Dragon is a mischievous little dragon with a big appetite! You’ll definitely want to stay on her good side when you battle in the Nexus, and you can learn more about her in our newest Hero Week blog!

title: Brightwing Hero Week
description: Cute does not equal harmless, and Brightwing the Faerie Dragon is a mischievous little dragon with a big appetite! You’ll definitely want to stay on her good side when you battle in the Nexus, and you can learn more about her in our newest Hero Week blog!

title: Heroes Technical Alpha Patch Notes -- April 15, 2014
description: We're in the process of releasing a brand new patch for the Heroes of the Storm Tech Alpha and detailed patch notes can be found within.

title: Heroes Technical Alpha Patch Notes -- April 15, 2014
description: We're in the process of releasing a brand new patch for the Heroes of the Storm Tech Alpha and detailed patch notes can be found within.

title: Bundle Packs Now Available in Heroes of the Storm
description: To prepare you for glorious battle in the Nexus, we’ll be testing a series bundle packs in Heroes of the Storm, each of which allows you to save at least 60% on select heroes, skins and mounts.

title: Bundle Packs Now Available in Heroes of the Storm
description: To prepare you for glorious battle in the Nexus, we’ll be testing a series bundle packs in Heroes of the Storm, each of which allows you to save at least 60% on select heroes, skins and mounts.

title: Hearthstone™ Now Available on iPad®!
description: It’s time to let your fingers do the dueling—Hearthstone: Heroes of Warcraft has arrived on the Apple® iPad®!

title: The Art of Xuezhi Wang, Magiclefty
description: This Community Showcase spotlights four action-packed pieces of Heroes of the Storm and Blizzard fan art by artist Xuezhi Wang, Magiclefty!

title: BlizzCon® 2014 Conquers Anaheim November 7 and 8
description: Southern California, prepare for invasion: BlizzCon is taking over the Anaheim Convention Center this November 7 and 8! Tickets go on sale in two batches on May 7 at 7 p.m. PT and May 10 at 10 a.m. PT. Check out the BlizzCon website for more details.

title: PAX East: Recap
description: PAX East 2014 was a wild ride of heroic proportions, and we’ve prepared an in-depth look about all that went down during this fantastic Boston gaming extravaganza!

title: BlizzCon® 2014 Contests – Prepare Yourself for Greatness
description: The time has come to start prepping for this year’s BlizzCon contests!

title: The Art of Liang Xing
description: This Community Showcase spotlights a character-filled piece of Heroes of the Storm fan art by artist Liang Xing!

title: Li Li Hero Week
description: Li Li is the niece of Legendary Pandaren Brewmaster Chen Stormstout, and she enjoys exploring strange new places, meeting new people, and kicking bad guys in the face! She’s just the spunky Pandaren you’ll want to have on your side in the Nexus, and you can learn all about her in our newest Hero Blog!

title: BlizzCon® 2014 Ticket Buying Tips
description: Reminder: The first batch of BlizzCon 2014 tickets goes on sale next Wednesday, May 7 at 7 p.m. PDT. Here are a few quick tips to help you get ready to try and snag some.

title: The Cosplay of Crimson
description: This community showcase spotlights cosplayer Crimson and his incredible renditions of a Diablo III Demon Hunter as well as Tyrael and his sword, El’druin!

title: Building the Nexus: The Voice of Nova
description: A lot goes into getting a Hero ready to step out onto the many Battlegrounds of the Nexus, and in this issue of Building the Nexus, we check in with the voice of Nova!

title: Monitoring Player Behavior in Technical Alpha
description: Going forward we will issuing be account bans for players who have been found to be repeatedly AFKing, leaving games, or determined to be toxic players in Heroes of the Storm.

title: Developer Q+A Broadcast - Session 5
description: It’s time to step back into the Nexus for our fifth Q&A session with the Heroes of the Storm development team where we’ll talk about a number of changes coming in the next Technical Alpha patch!

title: The Machinima of XimVoodoo
description: This community showcase spotlights machinima artist Xim Voodoo and her inspired machinima of Blizzard Heroes!

title: Murky Hero Week
description: At face value the petite Murky may not appear to be as formidable as other Heroes, but in Heroes of the Storm, Murky takes on the role of a persistent Specialist who wears down opponents by repeatedly respawning from his cleverly-hidden eggs a few second after being killed.  Just when you thought you got rid of him, he's back, and you can learn all about him in our newest Hero Blog!

title: Developer Insights: Clearing the Murky Waters
description: It’s time for another Developer Insights in which we explore the nitty-gritty of a hero’s design and its respective mechanics. We’ve got a very unique hero for you this week. Join us as Game Designer Kent-Erik Hagman sits down to clear the water surrounding our resident Murloc hero: Murky!

title: Heroes Technical Alpha Patch Notes -- May 22, 2014
description: We're in the process of releasing a brand new patch for the Heroes of the Storm Tech Alpha and detailed patch notes can be found within.

title: The Art of ShadowPriest
description: This Community Showcase spotlights Heroes of the Storm and Blizzard fan art by artist ShadowPriest!

title: Blizzard Entertainment Returns to San Diego Comic Con
description: Blizzard is proud to announce that we’ll be returning to this year’s San Diego Comic Con.

title: Muradin Hero Week
description: Once a mentor to Prince Arthas, Muradin was unable to prevent him from becoming the Lich King. In Heroes of the Storm, Muradin takes on the role of a durable Warrior who excels at diving into the heat of battle and disrupting enemies, while protecting teammates. This fearsome dwarf is just the Bronzebeard you’ll want by your side as you brawl in the Nexus, and you can learn all about him in our newest Hero Blog!

title: Developer Insights: Knockin' out Muradin's Design
description: Game Designer Matthew Cooper and Senior Game Designer Richard Khoo joined forces to lay down the law on Muradin's design and mechanics.

title: Building the Nexus: The Voice of Gazlowe
description: A lot goes into getting each unique Hero ready to brawl against other Heroes, and in this episode of Building the Nexus, we check in with the voice of Gazlowe!

title: The Art of Brad Whitlam
description: This Community Showcase spotlights three pieces of Heroes of the Storm fan art by artist Brad Whitlam!

title: Next Phase of the Technical Alpha Beginning Soon
description: In the coming weeks, the next phase of the Heroes of the Storm Technical Alpha will begin, and we wanted to let everyone know what changes lay ahead of us in the Nexus.

title: Incoming Changes to In-Game Experience
description: With our next Heroes Technical Alpha patch, we'll be removing in-game trickle experience bonuses for teams that are behind in levels during a match in order to test out what we're calling the "Underdog Bonus."

title: Zagara Hero Week
description: If Kerrigan is the Queen of the Zerg, then Zagara is the mother of the brood. Cunning and tenacious, she commands her vicious minions on the field of battle. You’ll definitely want this Zerg on your side as you seek to conquer your opponents in the Nexus, and you can learn all about her in our newest Hero Blog!

title: Skin Preview: Insectoid Zagara
description: In our latest update the Heroes of The Storm Technical Alpha, we released Zagara as a new playable Hero. We’ve uploaded a video to show off her brand new skin: Insectoid Zagara.

title: Developer Insights: Spillin' the Creep on Zagara
description: It’s time for another Developer Insights in which we explore a hero’s design and mechanics. We’ll be chatting with Senior Game Designer Richard Khoo about the zerg Broodmother herself, Zagara.

title: Enter To Win Exclusive Comic-Con Loot!
description: Are you #LOOTCRAZY? Read on to find out how you can win 1 of 25 Blizzard Comic-Con Goodie Bags!

title: Developer Insights Live: First look at the next patch
description: We'll be revisiting the Nexus for our sixth Q&A session with the Heroes of the Storm development team where we’ll talk about a number of changes coming in the next Technical Alpha patch!

title: Developer Insights: Garden Of Terror
description: With this episode of Developer Inisghts, we’re shifting our focus to a brand new battleground called Garden of Terror. Senior Technical Designer Meng Song gives us an overview.

title: Incoming Progression System and Reward Changes
description: Our next Heroes of the Storm Technical Alpha patch will bring a number of changes to the out-of-game Leveling System, Hero Quests, Player Profiles, and much, much more. Catch all of the juicy details by reading within.

title: Introducing Artifacts
description: We recently revealed that the next Technical Alpha patch will bring a number of changes to the Heroes of the Storm out-of-game Leveling System, and today we’d like to introduce another upcoming addition we’re making to the game: Artifacts!

title: Rehgar Hero Week
description: Rehgar Earthfury has seen his share of combat, both as a gladiator, and a master of his own team of fighters. Now, having put that life aside, he serves as a simple shaman of the Earthen Ring, earning his redemption by healing the broken lands of Azeroth...and now, the Nexus! You can learn all about him in our newest Hero Blog!

title: Rehgar Hero Week
description: Rehgar Earthfury has seen his share of combat, both as a gladiator, and a master of his own team of fighters. Now, having put that life aside, he serves as a simple shaman of the Earthen Ring, earning his redemption by healing the broken lands of Azeroth...and now, the Nexus! You can learn all about him in our newest Hero Blog!

title: Come Visit the Blizzard Booth at San Diego Comic-Con!
description: If you’re attending San Diego Comic-Con this year, swing by the Blizzard booth (Hall A, Booth 115) for the chance to win awesome loot, purchase SDCC exclusives, and get a chance to meet Warcraft movie director Duncan Jones!

title: Come Visit the Blizzard Booth at San Diego Comic-Con!
description: If you’re attending San Diego Comic-Con this year, swing by the Blizzard booth (Hall A, Booth 115) for the chance to win awesome loot, purchase SDCC exclusives, and get a chance to meet Warcraft movie director Duncan Jones!

description: We're in the process of releasing a brand new patch for the Heroes of the Storm Tech Alpha, and detailed patch notes can be found within.

description: We're in the process of releasing a brand new patch for the Heroes of the Storm Tech Alpha, and detailed patch notes can be found within.

title: Skin Preview: Frost Wyrm Arthas and Big Top Gazlowe
description: Enjoy a sneak peek at two skins that are currently in development: Frost Wyrm Arthas and Big Top Gazlowe!

title: Skin Preview: Frost Wyrm Arthas and Big Top Gazlowe
description: Enjoy a sneak peek at two skins that are currently in development: Frost Wyrm Arthas and Big Top Gazlowe!

title: Developer Insights: The Bloodlust of Rehgar
description: It’s time for another Designer Insights in which we explore a hero’s design and mechanics. We’ll be chatting with Game Designer Kent-Erik Hagman about the Earthen Ring Shaman himself, Rehgar.

description: It’s time for another Designer Insights in which we explore a hero’s design and mechanics. We’ll be chatting with Game Designer Kent-Erik Hagman about the Earthen Ring Shaman himself, Rehgar.

title: San Diego Comic-Con: Blizzard Showcase Panel Recap
description: Missed the Blizzard Showcase panel at San Diego Comic-Con? Get your recap here and find out what goodies were revealed.

title: San Diego Comic-Con: Blizzard Showcase Panel Recap
description: Missed the Blizzard Showcase panel at San Diego Comic-Con? Get your recap here and find out what goodies were revealed.

title: Blizzard Service Awards Unlocked
description: The Service Award ceremonies are an important Blizzard tradition that began in 1996. Check out our newly updated service awards page, which now features the two-year stein, new five-year swords, fifteen-year rings, and the twenty-year helm!

title: Update on Artifacts and Talent Unlocks
description: We're fortunate to have so many passionate people taking part in testing, and we’d like to take a moment to address your feedback on Artifacts and Hero Level Progression.

title: Stitches Hero Week
description: Ever since Abercrombie the Embalmer unleashed his abomination upon Darkshire, Stitches has wandered the road aimlessly, hungering for the flesh of low level Alliance players. Lucky for him, the Nexus has a diverse smorgasbord of Heroes to available appease his endless appetite, and you can learn all about him in our newest Hero Blog!

title: Gameplay Responsiveness Update
description: In Heroes of the Storm, the responsiveness of commands is critical. Here is how we have been working on your feedback in this area.

title: Matchmaking Design in Heroes of the Storm
description: We’d like to shed some light on matchmaking in Heroes of the Storm, and hopefully clear up some of the questions you may have.

title: World’s First Butterfly Cosplay – Part 2: Painting Monarch Brightwing
description: In the second part of this blog series, Community Manager Kimberly “Vaeflare” LeCrone shares with you the next set of steps she took to create a Monarch Brightwing sculpture that will serve as the base of what may very well be the world’s first butterfly cosplay!

title: Kerrigan Hero Week
description: Once a terran ghost with formidable psionic abilities, Sarah Kerrigan was betrayed by her allies and transformed by the zerg into the Queen of Blades. Now freed of the dark one's corruption, Kerrigan faces a threat that could destroy the galaxy itself, and you can learn all about her in our newest Hero Blog!

title: Developer Insights: The Heart of a Queen
description: This week, we’ll be focusing on a hero that’s been around since the beginning of the Technical Alpha. Join us for a chat with Game Designer Kent-Erik Hagman about the Queen of Blades, Kerrigan.

title: Introducing Battleground Pages
description: Our new Battlegrounds pages are now live! Be among the first to dive in and explore these exciting new interactive maps, which include videos of map objectives, mercenary camps, points of interest, and more!

title: Blizzard Invades PAX Prime
description: The Blizzard community is getting ready to storm PAX Prime once again, and you can find out all about what we have in-store for PAX attendees at this year's booth!

title: Heroes at PAX Prime 2014 Concludes
description: PAX Prime 2014 may be over, but don't worry: BlizzCon will be here before you know it! Find out more about what went down at Seattle's great gaming convention in our latest blog!

title: Attend BlizzCon® From Anywhere with the Virtual Ticket
description: This BlizzCon, get the best seat in the house—your own! Watch Blizzard’s two-day community celebration this November 7 and 8 online with the BlizzCon 2014 Virtual Ticket, available now in the Battle.net Shop.

title: Introducing the 64-bit Technical Alpha Game Client
description: We’ll be releasing a 64-bit version of the Technical Alpha client with our next patch. Read within to find out how you can launch it on patch day.

title: Chen Hero Week
description: To be a Brewmaster is to be an explorer, a lover of nature, and when the need arises; a powerful fighter. For years Chen Stormstout has wandered the world of Azeroth in search of rare ingredients, stirring stories, and of course, good brew, and now the wonders of the Nexus await him. You can learn all about this Legendary Brewmaster in our newest Hero Blog!

title: Heroes Technical Alpha Patch Notes -- Sept 10, 2014
description: We're in the process of releasing a brand new patch for the Heroes of the Storm Tech Alpha, and detailed patch notes can be found within.

title: Developer Insights: Chen and his Brew
description: It’s time for another Developer Insights in which we explore a hero’s design and mechanics. This week, we’ll be focusing on a hero from the Warcraft universe. Join us for a chat with Game Designer John Hodsgon about the Pandaren Brewmaster, Chen.

title: Final Phase of Technical Alpha Coming
description: We’re gearing up to enter the final phase of Technical Alpha, and there are several items you’ll want to keep in mind as it approaches. This is an exciting milestone for Heroes of the Storm. Preparing for this phase includes an account wipe, and we’d like to give you a rundown of everything you’ll need to know.

title: BlizzCon® 2014 In-Game Goodies Sneak Peek
description: BlizzCon loot explosion! Take a look at this year’s BlizzCon in-game goodies for World of Warcraft, StarCraft II, Diablo III, Hearthstone: Heroes of Warcraft, and the upcoming Heroes of the Storm.

title: Heroes of the Storm Trailer Cover by Avexom
description: This Community Showcase spotlights a rocking Heroes of the Storm trailer cover by Avexom!

title: Anub'arak Hero Week
description: Once a proud nerubian king, Anub'arak dared to stand against the Lich King's invasion, but despite his bravery, he too fell to the unrelenting Scourge. Resurrected into undeath, the Traitor King now serves as a towering weapon of destruction. But here in the Nexus, no one commands his power, and you can learn all about this fearsome nerubian in our newest Hero Blog!

title: Developer Insights: Burrowing Deep with Anub'arak
description: It’s time for another Developer Insights in which we explore a hero’s design and mechanics. This week, we’ll be focusing on an old king from the Warcraft universe. Join us for a chat with Game Designer Kent-Erik Hagman as we discuss the Traitor King himself, Anub’arak.

title: In Development: Master Skins
description: A few months ago, we shared a sneak peek at a new series of hero skins we’re currently developing called Master Skins, and you can set your sights on five of our newest ones in this blog!

title: Skin Previews: Anub'arak, Azmodan, and Hallow's End Skins
description: Enjoy a sneak peek at nine new skins that are currently in developmentt for Anub'arak, Azmodan, and Hallow's End, including our first Heroes of the Storm Legendary skin, Infested Tychus!

title: The Calm Before the Storm has Passed
description: Heroes of the Storm is now back online after for approximately one week of maintenance as we begin the final phase of Technical Alpha testing, and performed our final planned account wipe. Read inside for complete details.

title: Coming Soon: Custom Games, Observer Mode, and Replays
description: The return of the Technical Alpha will offer a very early look at a few features for Heroes of the Storm that we’re sure some of you will be excited to try out. Today, we’d like to introduce you to our initial implementation for Custom Games, Observer mode, and Replays.

title: Heroes Technical Alpha Patch Notes -- Oct 7, 2014
description: The Heroes Technical Alpha is back online and we'vbe just released a brand new patch. Complete patch notes can be found within.

title: Technical Alpha is Back Online!
description: After more than a week of extended maintenance, the Heroes of the Storm Technical Alpha is back online for North America, Latin America, South East Asia, Australia, and New Zealand! Read on for more details.

title: Brawl with the Blues
description: We'll be inviting a few Heroes of the Storm  community members to party up with us in-game, and celebrate the return of the Technical Alpha after the conclusion of The Calm before the Storm.

title: Check Out the BlizzCon® 2014 Map and Schedule
description: BlizzCon 2014 is almost here! To help you form a plan of attack, we've just posted a schedule of the panels, eSports tournaments, and other activities happening at BlizzCon on Friday and Saturday, along with a map to help you get the lay of the land.

title: Heroes Exhibition Matches at BlizzCon 2014
description: BlizzCon 2014 is fast-approaching, and we’re pleased to announce that this year’s show will play host to the very first official Heroes of the Storm exhibition tournament!

title: The Gaming-Inspired Foods of Eat Game Live
description: This Community Showcase spotlights the many gamer-inspired foods of Kierpanda at Eat Game Live, including her newest creation: Blackheart's Doubloons!

title: Heroes of The Storm Exhibition: Team Liquid
description: To follow-up on our recent announcement for the Heroes Exhibition Tournament at BlizzCon this year, we’d like to introduce you to the teams and the players who will be battling it out for glory. To kick things off, we’ll start with Team Liquid and their all-star Roster:

title: Azmodan Hero Week
description: The Lord of Sin rules over a densely populated land of hell where both the greatest joys and despair, and the deepest depravities can be experienced. But it is never enough for Azmodan, who has set his eyes on the realm of Sanctuary, and now, the Nexus! You can learn all about the clever Lord of Sin in our newest Hero Blog!

title: Azmodan Hero Week
description: The Lord of Sin rules over a densely populated land of hell where both the greatest joys and despair, and the deepest depravities can be experienced. But it is never enough for Azmodan, who has set his eyes on the realm of Sanctuary, and now, the Nexus! You can learn all about the clever Lord of Sin in our newest Hero Blog!

title: 2014 Halloween Pumpkin Carving Contest
description: The Halloween season has finally arrived, and we’re ready to cut straight to the heart of the holiday. If you’re dying to pick up a knife and hack, gash, slash, and jab at something, then you might be excited to hear that as of October 14, Blizzard’s 2014 Halloween Pumpkin Carving Contest has officially begun!

title: 2014 Halloween Pumpkin Carving Contest
description: The Halloween season has finally arrived, and we’re ready to cut straight to the heart of the holiday. title: Madeon to Bring His Epic Live Show to the Brawl in London!
description: As we announced yesterday, we’re thrilled to welcome Artist/Producer Madeon to our Heroes of the Storm launch event in London on Monday, June 1.

title: Brawl With The Blues: Launch Edition
description: Heroes of the Storm is releasing on June 2nd, 2015 and we’d like to celebrate with a few games of Heroes!

description: Tune in to the Heroes launch event live stream at NexusCalling.com this afternoon. You won’t want to miss it!

description: As part of our launch celebration for Heroes of the Storm, we’ve got a super-sized Weekly Sale in store for you.
